pageProduct.name: Polident MAX SEAL Denture Adhesive Cream 40g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

Information

Do irritating food particles get stuck under your denture?

Polident MAX SEAL is designed to help block out irritating food particles while providing a firm, long-lasting hold.

The precision nozzle with a finer tip enables exactly the right amount of product to be applied around the edge of your denture forming an all-round seal.

The benefits of Polident MAX SEAL Denture Adhesive means that you don't have to let your dentures decide what you eat. Helping to keep your dentures comfortable and secure, the adhesive gives you the freedom to enjoy the foods you love.

Brought to you by Polident, the #1 Brand in Denture Care*.

Polident Max Seal provides multi-benefits

More precise application*

*compared to standard Polident in laboratory test

Less excess product ooze out*

*compared to standard Polident in laboratory test

Up to 12 hours of strong hold

Seals out up to 74% more food particles**

**versus no adhesive after 1 hour on a lower full denture

How to use and remove Polident MAX SEAL

Apply Polident adhesive once a day in short strips, not too close to denture edges.
Rinse mouth before inserting dentures.
Press dentures into place, hold firmly, and bite down for a few seconds to secure hold.
Swish mouth with warm water, then slowly remove denture using a rocking motion.

Remove adhesive residue from denture and mouth with warm water anda soft brush. Use Polident Cleanser to thoroughly clean your denture and then rinse with water.

General Information

Polident Max Seal Denture Adhesive Cream wit max seal precision nozzle to help form an all-around seal. Also has the same formulation as Polident Flavour Free Denture Adhesive Cream.

Polident Max Seal delivers superior surface coverage (Compared to standard Polident Flavour Free Denture Adhesive Cream) for food seal protection and strong all-day hold. The precision nozzle enables exactly the right amount of product to be applied around the edge of your denture forming an all-around seal.

- Flavour free.

Size: 40g

Warnings

Keep out of sight and reach of children. A few individuals may be sensitive or allergic to this product. If you experience an allergic reaction or discomfort, discontinue use immediately. Other side effects such as oral irritations and gastrointestinal symptoms (e.g. Nausea) may occur.

PRECAUTIONS

Swallowing small amounts of this product, when used as directed, may occur and is not harmful. Ill-fitting dentures may impair your health. Visit your dentist regularly to check your denture fit. To keep tip from clogging, keep cap and nozzle dry.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Read directions first.

Ingredients

Calcium/Sodium PVM/MA Copolymer, Petrolatum, Cellulose Gum, Mineral Oil.

Directions

Please keep this carton for the directions for use.

For the first time, use a small amount. Use more if needed. too much adhesive can cause oozing; apply less next time if this occurs. It may take a few tries to find the right amount for your denture. Apply once a day for secure hold. If you need to apply more than once a day, seek advice from your dental care professional.

Applying: 1. Clean and dry your dentures.
2. Apply product as shown in the diagram, not too close to denture edges.
A. Upper denture: Apply in a long continuous strip. Apply 2 shorter strips in the middle of the denture.
B. Lower denture: Apply product in a long continuous strip.
C. Partial denture: Apply 2 short strips.
3. Rinse mouth before inserting dentures.
4. Press dentures into place, hold firmly, and bite down for a few seconds to secure hold.

Removing:
1. Swish mouth with water, then slowly remove denture using a rocking motion.
2. Remove adhesive residue from denture and mouth with warm water and soft brush.
3. Use Polident Cleanser to thoroughly clean your denture and then rinse with water.

USAGE ADVICE

Refasten cap after use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store in a cool, dry place.
